control

Class ItemListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.ItemListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ItemListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Handle menu item reactions.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Rio Alexandre

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String aboutText
      Text displayed in the about dialog, after clicking on about in the menu bar.
      private static java.lang.String confirmText
      Text displayed if the text area is not empty and have to be cleared.
      private static java.lang.String helptext
      Text displayed in the help dialog, after clicking on help in the menu bar.
      private static java.lang.String sizeWarningText
      Text displayed if the file lines are longer than 80 columns ( this is deprecated).
      private NfoView theView
      Frame containing the Component having listener.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ItemListener(NfoView view)
      Create an ItemListener to handle events on the menu items.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void aboutAction()
      Display about window.
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e) 
      private void clearAction()
      Clear the text area after confirmation if the text area is not empty.
      private void helpAction()
      Display help window.
      private void newAction() 
      private void openAction()
      Open a file and display it, if a file is already displayed ask to confirm the action.
      private void quitAction()
      Exit the application after confirmation if the text area is not empty.
      private void save()
      Write the content of the textArea in the currentFile.
      private void saveAction()
      Write the content of the text area in the current file, if its not defined call saveAsAction()
      private void saveAsAction()
      Ask to choose the name of the file to save.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
